---
name: Crimp and Test Power Board Wires
about: Task to crimp and test wires connecting power board to main board
title: 'Crimp and test power board to main board wires'
labels: hardware, testing
assignees: ''
---

## Task Description
Crimp and test the wires that connect the power board to the main board.

## Steps to Complete
- [ ] Prepare wire lengths for power board to main board connections
- [ ] Crimp connectors on both ends of each wire
- [ ] Visual inspection of all crimps
- [ ] Continuity test on each crimped wire
- [ ] Test voltage/current path integrity
- [ ] Document any issues found

## Acceptance Criteria
- All wires are properly crimped
- All connections pass continuity tests
- Power board connects securely to main board
- No short circuits detected

## Notes
Keep it simple and straightforward.
